sourcesContent:
• {{ bill }}
No Bills Found! import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute } from '@angular/router'; import { Bill } from '../bill'; import { BillServiceService } from '../bill-service.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-result', templateUrl: './result.component.html', styleUrls: ['./result.component.css'], }) export class ResultComponent { userName!: String; password!: String; Bills!: Bill[]; checkBillsStatus() { return this.Bills.length != 0; } constructor( private _Activedroute: ActivatedRoute, private billService: BillServiceService ) { this.userName = this._Activedroute.snapshot.params['userName']; this.password = this._Activedroute.snapshot.params['password']; } ngOnInit() { this.billService .getAllBillsAdmin() .subscribe((bills) => (this.Bills = bills)); } }
